ramezani-etal-2021-unsupervised-framewor.title: An unsupervised framework for tracing textual sources of moral change
ramezani-etal-2021-unsupervised-framewor.author:
Ramezani, Aida  and
Zhu, Zining  and
Rudzicz, Frank  and
Xu, Yang
ramezani-etal-2021-unsupervised-framewor.paperContributionText: COVID-19 news dashboard that visualises sentiment in pandemic news coverage in different languages across Europe
ramezani-etal-2021-unsupervised-framewor.paperResultsText: Unified overview of news events on COVID-19 news overall sentiment, and the region and language of publication from the period starting from the beginning of January 2020 to the end of January 2021
ramezani-etal-2021-unsupervised-framewor.langOther: 20 european languages (at, be, bg, cz, de, ee, es, fi, fr, gr, ie, it, lt, md, nl, pt, ro, se, sm, va)
ramezani-etal-2021-unsupervised-framewor.resourcesOtherText: cross-lingual news sentiment classifier (Pelicon et al. 2020)
